attributes.action: Put Altruism before Narcissism. Reward charity more than self interest.
attributes.background: Our society's culture promotes selfishness, greed and insular existence. We pay finance industry employees so much more than those who put themselves at risk for our safety. We need to start by looking at the pay and conditions of Nurses, Teachers, Fire, Police, Ambulance, and Doctors.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
